constructor.details: parameterize the variables according to network

params._chainlinkOracle: 1. the address of the oracle to create requests to
params._chainlinkToken: 2. the address of LINK token contract
params._jobId: 3. the job id for Staking efficiency job

fulfillSLI(bytes32,bytes32).details: callback function for the Chainlink SLI request which stores the SLI in the SLA contract

params._requestId: the ID of the ChainLink request

parseSLIData(bytes32).details: recieves a string of "hits,misses" data and returns hits and misses as uint256

params.sliData: the ID of the ChainLink request

requestSLI(uint256,address).details: creates a ChainLink request to get a new SLI value for the given params. Can only be called by the SLARegistry contract or Chainlink Oracle.

setSLARegistry().details: sets the SLARegistry contract address and can only be called once

fee.details: fee for Chainlink querys. Currently 0.1 LINK

requestIdToSLIRequest.details: Mapping that stores chainlink sli request information

slaRegistryAddress.details: The address of the SLARegistry contract
